alert.note: Alert for Williams (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 11 at 8:31PM CDT until April 13 at 2:12AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Little Muddy River near Williston affecting Williams County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Little Muddy River near Williston. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, CO-8 by gage road has water on it. CO-7B also floods at this level. The Little Muddy Recreation area near Williston floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 10.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is forecast to fall to below flood stage tonight. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.0 feet on 03/15/1994. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
